nf03.title: Slimegirl
nf03.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product of alchemy. A human girl long ago, so long she forgot already.

Astoriel_Crafter.title: Ремесленник
Astoriel_Crafter.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] обладает врожденной способностью находить и восстанавливать технологии из различных обломков. [PAWN_pronoun] так же неплохо проявляет себя в бою.

Astoriel_Scientist.title: Наблюдатель
Astoriel_Scientist.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] исследователь звезд. [PAWN_pronoun] знает все дорожки вокруг лаборатории.

Astoriel_XenoZoo.title: Пастух
Astoriel_XenoZoo.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] работает на ранчо и каждый день проводит с животными.

Astoriel_Colinizer.title: Разведчик
Astoriel_Colinizer.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] открывает новые земли, на которых могли бы вырасти новые поселения.

Astoriel_Soldier.title: Боец
Astoriel_Soldier.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] долгое время служит в штурмовых отрядах.

Astoriel_Ambassador.title: Танцор
Astoriel_Ambassador.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] профессиональный танцор. [PAWN_pronoun] часто выступает в разных городах, неизменно собирая аплодисменты и деньги.

Astoriel_Officer.title: Золотой рыцарь
Astoriel_Officer.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] отличный воин и ведет за собой рыцарей в бой.

Astoriel_Nurse.title: Алхимик
Astoriel_Nurse.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] долгое время занимается работой над разнообразными снадобьями и поисками философского камня.

Astoriel_NavyCook.title: Повар
Astoriel_NavyCook.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] умеет готовить множество разнообразных блюд. [PAWN_pronoun] любит работать на кухне.

Astoriel_Shellshocked.title: Выживший
Astoriel_Shellshocked.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] служил(-а) в войсках. После атаки на вражеский лагерь, [PAWN_pronoun] остается единственным(-ой) выжившим(-ей) из всего отряда. [PAWN_pronoun] больше никогда не хочет сражаться.

Astoriel_Hydro.title: Фермер
Astoriel_Hydro.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] всю жизнь живет вдали от города и занимается уходом за растениями.

Astoriel_Slasher.title: Рыцарь
Astoriel_Slasher.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] хранит порядок на землях государства и умеет насаждать волю правящих железной рукой.

Astoriel_GeneWarrior.title: Герой
Astoriel_GeneWarrior.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] рожден(а) вести за собой воинов к новым победам.

Astoriel_CapitalChild.title: Дипломат
Astoriel_CapitalChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] с детства умеет хорошо говорить и часто пользуется этим, [PAWN_pronoun] держится подальше от проблем.

Astoriel_GeneChild.title: Искатель приключений
Astoriel_GeneChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] с ранних лет любит бродить по разным местам и умеет находить себе разнообразные приключения.

Astoriel_SpacerChild.title: Каменщик
Astoriel_SpacerChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] дитя семьи каменщиков и с ранних лет работает с камнем и умеет стоить, [PAWN_pronoun] так же хорошо понимает необходимость координировать усилия на больших строительных проектах.

Astoriel_ColonyChild.title: Беглец
Astoriel_ColonyChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] исконный житель улиц больших городов. [PAWN_pronoun] умеет делать множество разных вещей, от плетения веревок до плетения разговоров.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_01.title: Kurin Orphan
Kurin_BackstoryChild_01.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were killed by humans when [PAWN_pronoun] was young. [PAWN_pronoun] got PTSD after that, and has gone through psychiatric treatment for many years. [PAWN_pronoun] is mostly fine nowadays, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] suffers from nightmares about that day.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_02.title: Kurin Young Maid
Kurin_BackstoryChild_02.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents lost their entire wealth in an unfortunate accident and got a lot of debt. But fortunately, one noble took pity on them and hired [PAWN_nameDef] as a housemaid. In the noble's mansion, [PAWN_pronoun] mostly did household chore and sometimes took care of the noble's daughter, and eventually became friends with her.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_03.title: Kurin Vigilante
Kurin_BackstoryChild_03.desc: The Vigilante Fox Squad was one of the most popular TV animations among young Kurins. [PAWN_nameDef] gathered some friends and created their own vigilante squad. They patrolled fields and alleys, considered themselves as peacekeeping guardians of the local city. But since public security was good enough around there, there was not much to do.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_04.title: Kurin Bullied Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_04.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rare blue-eyed child. Since it was a ominous sign among Kurin culture, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up as a lonely child, shunned by everyone from children to adults.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_05.title: Kurin Trouble Maker
Kurin_BackstoryChild_05.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was envied by some children but also an absolute headache for teachers. Everyone was terrified because of [PAWN_nameDef]'s villainy, including skipping cleaning duty, not listening to teachers or not dust off shoes in the entrance.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_06.title: Kurin Slum Orphan
Kurin_BackstoryChild_06.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood wandering through the trash, eating moldy bread. There was a facility to help orphans, but after the Republic of Kurin devoted all its resource into the building of migration ships, [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive proper welfare benefits and lived in a cardboard box house built in an alley.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_07.title: Kurin Ball Catcher
Kurin_BackstoryChild_07.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved baseball, so [PAWN_pronoun] went into human nations and watched every baseball game [PAWN_pronoun] could afford. As [PAWN_pronoun] watched every game, she frequently got caught on the camera, and was eventually picked up by the team and became a ball catcher.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_08.title: Kurin Zoo Part-timer
Kurin_BackstoryChild_08.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a poor family because [PAWN_pronoun] had many siblings. So [PAWN_pronoun] became a self-supporting student, working at the zoo as a part-time job to pay for their tuition fee. [PAWN_pronoun] mostly took care of herbivores, which was relatively easy to handle. And [PAWN_pronoun] didn't neglect studying either.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_09.title: Kurin Lazy child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_09.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] got really tired of everything, so [PAWN_pronoun] just sat in a room, played games every day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care about friends either. As [PAWN_pronoun] didn't wash often, the room smelled bad too. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were very worried about their child.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_10.title: Kurin Ordinary Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_10.desc: Born in an average middle class family, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up fine, warmly loved by their parents. Like other children, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed having fun and eating sweet macaroons. Their grades were neither really good or bad, but [PAWN_pronoun] was a generous child who really took care of their friends.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_11.title: Kurin Professional Gamer
Kurin_BackstoryChild_11.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s game skills were unmatched by anyone. [PAWN_pronoun] could adapt to any game very quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] always kept top ten ranking, and [PAWN_pronoun] even won the championship in several competitions. But whenever internet connection went bad, [PAWN_pronoun] became really sad and refuses to do anything.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_12.title: Kurin Country Kid
Kurin_BackstoryChild_12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood with nature, picking mushrooms from the mountains, chased cats in the fields, or fishing at the river. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] got little sunburns, but she grew healthy regardless.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_13.title: Kurin City Kid
Kurin_BackstoryChild_13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in downtown of the Kurin metropolis, with plenty of things to do, such as hobby, entertainment, VR games and so on. But most of all, [PAWN_nameDef]'s favorite thing to do was traveling with her family.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_14.title: Kurin Young Cartoonist
Kurin_BackstoryChild_14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved drawing and had talent. When [PAWN_pronoun] started drawing, [PAWN_pronoun] concentrated so much that [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't notice others at all. Even during their study, she was often scolded by her teacher, but her passion couldn't be stopped.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_15.title: Kurin Single-tail syndrome
Kurin_BackstoryChild_15.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with one tail unlike others. Life was not impaired at all, but slow growth made [PAWN_nameDef] look younger than her peers. When she was young, she was teased a lot, but as she grew older, she became more popular with cute looks than other Kurins.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_16.title: Kurin Timid Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_16.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very scared child. Everywhere was full of scary things. The shadows of the night, the small sounds that you hear when you sleep. [PAWN_pronoun] often got surprised by honks. The one she hated most was the bugs, she is frightened and fleeing as long as they came out. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't even think about fighting back.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_17.title: Kurin Affectionate Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a friendly child. [PAWN_pronoun] had always listened to their friends and sincerely comforted their friends who had bad days. [PAWN_pronoun] was a good child who made her friends day brighter.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_18.title: Kurin Poor Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_18.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a poor childhood. Both parents returned home late at night, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew up a little earlier than others as [PAWN_pronoun] left was alone in the daytime. [PAWN_pronoun]'s dream was to make a lot of money and studied hard to make her dreams come true.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_19.title: Kurin Cafe Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped her parents cafe after school. [PAWN_pronoun] took orders and did cleaning. Some regular customers often gave some tips. With that, [PAWN_pronoun] bought ice cream or saved money.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_20.title: Kurin Tofu House Daughter
Kurin_BackstoryChild_20.desc: The family of [PAWN_nameDef] has continued to make tofu in the traditional way and has a well-established store for over 100 years. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up learning their mother's teaching that one should make their tofu with all their heart, regardless of Human's favorite, tofu or Kurin's favorite, fried tofu.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_21.title: Kurin Red-light District Runner
Kurin_BackstoryChild_21.desc: It is illegal in the Republic of Kurin to hire young children to work in red-light districts. However, [PAWN_nameDef] touted other Kurins in the red-light districts or running errands at convenience stores, and gained a lot of money as a child. Since [PAWN_pronoun] was a clever, cunning child, she was able to easily avoid crackdowns.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_22.title: Kurin Young Crafter
Kurin_BackstoryChild_22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had better dexterity than others. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to make cute handicrafts and share them with friends, and it was always popular among friends.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_23.title: Kurin Young Gardener
Kurin_BackstoryChild_23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved everything about plants. Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] had spare time, [PAWN_pronoun] went to the farm and looked after crops, or [PAWN_pronoun] went to the nearest botanical garden.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_24.title: Kurin Young Chef
Kurin_BackstoryChild_24.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had fun baking bread and cookies or decorating cakes. [PAWN_pronoun] always got praised in cooking class, and soon after [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a talent in other dishes. From simple meal to lavish cuisine, [PAWN_pronoun] could make all sorts of dishes.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_25.title: Kurin Animal Lover
Kurin_BackstoryChild_25.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved animals. [PAWN_pronoun] would like to raise as many as animals [PAWN_pronoun] can, but due to realistic problems, [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to raise a robot pet. However, [PAWN_pronoun] liked the warmth of real living animals than robots, and often went to the zoo.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_26.title: Kurin Smart Student
Kurin_BackstoryChild_26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s grades were better than other students. Exam scores have always been high, and relationships with other friends have been good. However, [PAWN_nameDef]'s body became weak as [PAWN_pronoun] spent a long time sitting at their desk, and it became common for them to sit quietly in the corner in PE classes.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_27.title: Kurin Versatile Child
Kurin_BackstoryChild_27.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was talented in various fields such as studying, cooking, crating, and sports, but it rather made [PAWN_pronoun] difficult to focus on one field. [PAWN_pronoun] wandered for a while to find her career.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_28.title: Kurin Bookworm
Kurin_BackstoryChild_28.desc: The small sound of turning the page, smell of old paper... [PAWN_nameDef] loved reading books with their reading lights on and their room was full of books. [PAWN_nameDef] often spent all day reading books in an old library.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_29.title: First Kurin
Kurin_BackstoryChild_29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the first Kurin pioneers. When their ship made it onto the new planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to wake up for hundreds of years due to a fault in the cryptosleep casket. Only recently did Kurin mastered the cryptosleep technology and [PAWN_pronoun] finally woke up.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_30.title: Kurin Foreign Student
Kurin_BackstoryChild_30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a foreign student in the human nations, who had been away from parents since [PAWN_pronoun] was a child. Fortunately, the school [PAWN_pronoun] attended was a place with good children and teachers, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to grow up as an outgoing, warm-hearted fox.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_31.title: Kurin Young Musician
Kurin_BackstoryChild_31.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young fox who loved music and loved to sing with friends. [PAWN_pronoun] became more and more entertained by music as [PAWN_pronoun] composed own songs and music, and even got good responses from others. But their parents were not particularly happy about that.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_32.title: Kurin Child Actor
Kurin_BackstoryChild_32.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for excellent acting skills and rich emotional expression despite a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to appear in many movies and dramas, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to learn various skills while acting in various genres.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_33.title: Kurin Outgoing Student
Kurin_BackstoryChild_33.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been popular among friends for cute looks and bright, cheerful personality. Later on, [PAWN_pronoun] became a celebrity, but since [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't play or live freely with friends as before, [PAWN_pronoun] felt lonely after all. Not long after, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to retire and return to normal life.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_34.title: Kurin Martial Art Trainee
Kurin_BackstoryChild_34.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a wimp, weaker than peers. [PAWN_pronoun] began to practice several sports and martial arts to overcome this. [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard and has become strong enough to win regional competitions.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_35.title: Kurin Scout
Kurin_BackstoryChild_35.desc: The young [PAWN_nameDef] had a great yearning for the children's scouts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents bought uniforms for their child despite their poverty, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to join the Scouts and spent happy days learning various skills such as camping, botany and survival.

Kurin_BackstoryChild_36.title: Kurin Athlete
Kurin_BackstoryChild_36.desc: Unlike most Kurins, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to move, and joined the school's athletic club to do various sports. PE class was a solo stage of [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] was considerate enough to help the ones who were bullied. But unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef]'s grade was not really good.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_01.title: Kurin Journalist
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_01.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a journalist who writes an article in a newspaper. [PAWN_pronoun] covered recent state of the nation, culture, and diplomacy. Surprisingly, the proportion of politics is not that big. Because everyone believes Republic of Kurin is fair, upright nation.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_02.title: Kurin Hired Maid
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_02.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a maid hired in a mansion of a noble. [PAWN_pronoun] did cleaning and prepared meals as a housekeeper, but also worked as a butler from purchase goods for maintaining the mansion to managing the account. [PAWN_pronoun] gained master's trust along the way.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_03.title: Kurin Restaurant Waiter
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_03.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] works at the restaurant, taking orders from customers, serving food, and organizing tables. Although the hair often came out of the food, many guests liked [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] even learned the chef's brilliant cooking skills and knives.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_04.title: Kurin Prey
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_04.desc: Fox hunting is a luxury sport of human nobles that have been around for a long time. Although banned for cruelty, it has been gaining popularity again since the emergence of Kurin. As a prey, [PAWN_nameDef] wore a fur suit and ran away from the hunters. The bullet was a relatively fragile salt bullet, but [PAWN_pronoun] had bruise all over the body.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_05.title: Kurin Terrorist
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_05.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is well-known terrorist among international society. But in reality, [PAWN_pronoun] was a hero who assassinated an officer in a dictatorship who killed Kurins for fun. Nobody knew this and [PAWN_pronoun] always had to run away, but [PAWN_pronoun] thinks [PAWN_pronoun] did the right thing.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_06.title: Kurin Rabies Survivor
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_06.desc: In a pandemonium city where rabies-infected Kurins gone insane and bite each other, [PAWN_nameDef] managed to hide in a convenience store. [PAWN_pronoun] could hear horrible screams and sound of the Kurins biting each other from the outside all day long. After few days, [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually rescued, but the horrifying memories remained.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_07.title: Kurin Massager
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_07.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] works at a massage shop located in red-light district. [PAWN_pronoun] usual job is to give customers a massage with spices and oil to relieve fatigue, but there is also a special service available for those who want something more. [PAWN_pronoun] touched a lot of other Kurin's body, and the tips were very helpful to livelihood.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_08.title: Kurin Natural Fox
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_08.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] got tired city life, so [PAWN_pronoun] went into the mountains. [PAWN_pronoun] built an old-fashioned house that barely had water and electricity, handling farming and chores by oneself. [PAWN_pronoun] always had dirt and water in hands.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_09.title: Kurin Citizen
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_09.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary citizen. Citizens who work hard every day doing their own work are the very foundation and basis of the Kurin's society. They will overcome any difficulty under the identity of Kurin.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_10.title: Kurin Bank Receptionist
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_10.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a smart fox who worked in a bank, who is in charge of various tasks. From taking care of the other Kurin's deposits to consult on loans. [PAWN_pronoun] loved the job and had a satisfying work life thanks to good colleagues.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_11.title: Kurin Vineyard Lookout
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_11.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a lookout, wearing a straw hat and sitting on a wooden hut to protect the vineyard. When cute little young Kurins came to stole the grapes they looked after, they shouted out firecely to kick them out. When the grapes weren't ripe enough, they used to laugh as they watched the little ones crying in sourness.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_12.title: Kurin Pilot
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a pilot who's able to fly a light aircraft. [PAWN_pronoun] got in trouble when [PAWN_pronoun] helped the blue hedgehog who stole seven jewels and cross the border, so [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't do that kind of work anymore.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_13.title: Kurin Police
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an excellent police officer who graduated from the police school with the highest grades. [PAWN_nameDef]'s personality was not really suitable for the police, but after so much effort, [PAWN_pronoun] achieved one's dream, and shook off other's sarcasm.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_14.title: Kurin Armory Clerk
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Redfox Armory's clerk, who's in charge of warehouse documents. But [PAWN_pronoun] is not really familiar of actual gunsmithing since all [PAWN_pronoun] did was paperworks.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_15.title: Kurin Missionary
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_15.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] followed religious beliefs and lived life for helping poor Kurins. [PAWN_nameDef]'s life was mostly in poverty, but the heart was wealthier than anyone else.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_16.title: Kurin Trade Salesperson
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_16.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a salesperson of a trading company that sells various Kurin products to other nations. Kurin is known as a affable, but crafty trader among other nations, and [PAWN_pronoun] is just like that. But recently, relations with other countries have got worsened and sales have been difficult.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_17.title: Kurin Groundcrew
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a groundcrew of Kurin airport who's in charge of sending signal to aircrafts with light sticks. Few layers of earplugs were not enough to protect [PAWN_nameDef]'s sensitive ears against loud engine noise. But eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] got used to it. [PAWN_pronoun] even managed to tie up the tails, as tails were fluttered all over the place thanks to the fierce wind.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_18.title: Kurin Caravan Trader
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_18.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was originally an ordinary door-to-door salesman, but now [PAWN_pronoun] is stuck on the Rimworld and is now leading the caravan, doing business between different settlements. Usually they only visit fellow Kurin settlements, but often they visit other faction settlements to trade goods they need.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_19.title: Kurin Part-timer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Kurin who works part-time at a convenience store in a boring residential area. Since there are not many customers at night, [PAWN_pronoun] study whenever [PAWN_pronoun] have time. But [PAWN_pronoun] does not neglect the work. [PAWN_pronoun] dream of becoming costruction engineer one day, and preparing for that day-by-day.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_20.title: Kurin Tout
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] touted to Kurins and humans who came to the beach. The game [PAWN_pronoun] prepared was something like throwing a ball to hit the dolls or popping balloons with darts, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] selled cheap souvenirs with ridiculous prices. During the holiday season, [PAWN_pronoun] gained quite a lot of income.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_21.title: Kurin Marketplace Cook
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_21.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] sold food at cheap price in the old Kurin marketplace. Fried tofu, various snacks, and even meals. Nowadays, Kurins usually go to big department stores, but thanks to [PAWN_nameDef]'s cooking skills, [PAWN_pronoun] got some reputation among customers.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_22.title: Kurin Former Chef
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chef working in a luxury hotel of a human nation. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was fired after receiving frequent complaints from customers that hair comes from the food of a luxury hotel. [PAWN_pronoun] returned to the Republic of Kurin afterwards, and worked at a small restaurant. Although [PAWN_pronoun] got paid less, but at least [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't have to worry about complaints.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_23.title: Kurin Animal Handler
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a popular handler of the zoo. [PAWN_pronoun] mainly care for young animal and trained them for stage performances. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] became guide for visitors, and [PAWN_pronoun] was always popular.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_24.title: Kurin Hydroponics Farmer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_24.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a hydroponic farm located at outskirt of the city. [PAWN_pronoun] grew various crops in a perfectly sterilized environment and researched new seeds. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] also cook with own crops as a pastime.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_25.title: Kurin Potter
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_25.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few potters left in the Kurin Republic due to the development of 3D printing technology. [PAWN_pronoun] created works that pursue beauty and value rather than practicality, and they were sold as a masterpiece items with high prices.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_26.title: Kurin Hatmaker
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] tailors various hats made with silk. [PAWN_pronoun] went to a distant human country to learn how to tailor hats with traditional method, and the hats [PAWN_pronoun] tailored have become very popular among Kurins. But [PAWN_pronoun] gained painful chronic illness due to mercury poisoning, which was one of the ingredient of the silk, and now lives with anxiety and hand tremor.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_27.title: Kurin Watchmaker
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_27.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent whole life learning how to make clock in a human nation. [PAWN_pronoun] gained great popularity among wealthy Kurins since [PAWN_pronoun] carved each piece of watch with delicate handwork and made artistic masterpiece.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_28.title: Kurin Fish Chef
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to make delicate cuisine with fish very well. [PAWN_pronoun] could trim fish neatly with a sharp knife, mix with various sweet and sour sauces, and cook in a oven or frying pan. The cuisine of [PAWN_nameDef] was so popular that even humans would come from a far, but after the humans closed the border, only the Kurins could eat it.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_29.title: Kurin Dress Designer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] just got a job as a dress designer after graduated from school. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of making a variety of pretty dresses, but still lacks skills. [PAWN_pronoun] is currently an intern in a studio, but [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of creating own studio and making dresses under own name.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_30.title: Kurin Tailor
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_30.desc: The capital, the oldest city of Kurin, has several alleys filled with old, small shops. [PAWN_nameDef] had a small tailor's. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] sell fabric and clothes, [PAWN_pronoun] also repaired them with sewing machines and made simple clothes or decorations.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_31.title: Kurin Factory Worker
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_31.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was busy assembling electronic parts and picking out defects in the production line of a factory. The income was not that good, but [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard, dreaming of a better life.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_32.title: Kurin Lumberjack
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_32.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a lumberjack in a dense forest. The work was dangerous, and [PAWN_pronoun] hated physical labor like any other Kurin, but [PAWN_pronoun] thought it was not bad to working with other cool Kurins.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_33.title: Kurin Poor Roboticist
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_33.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] study various mechanoids. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a few defects while researching discarded mechanoids and put a lot of efforts to resolve them, but there was not much of success. Afterwards, the Republic's funding were about to be cut off, and [PAWN_pronoun] was struggling with a needy life in a small housing.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_34.title: Kurin Astronaut
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_34.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced astronaut, and [PAWN_pronoun] visited all planets in the system. There are no missions to outer space execept sending unmmaned probes, but if someone were going to the outer space by a manned spacecraft, he would be the first.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_35.title: Kurin Mechanic Assistant
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] came to a human nation to gain experience. [PAWN_pronoun] got a job as a mechanic for a civilian airline, but as [PAWN_pronoun] lacked experience and skill, [PAWN_pronoun] worked as an assistant doing only trivial things. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't talked a lot, so [PAWN_pronoun] worked as hard [PAWN_pronoun] he could.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_36.title: Kurin Electrician
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] could climb high transmission tower and replaced electric wires and parts. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to keep balance with three tails, so [PAWN_pronoun] didn't need safety gears. As [PAWN_pronoun] could work really quickly with good dexterity, the income was pretty good. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of living happily with lover by finding a good home in the suburbs.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_37.title: Kurin Plumber
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_37.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to connect pipes and assemble air ducts at the construction site, but was recently fired because of recent economic crisis. [PAWN_pronoun] and collegues have heard that the situation of the Republic is not good, but they do not know the details because they lacked common sense.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_38.title: Kurin Heavy Industry Technician
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_38.desc: Silverfox Heavy Industries is a major company that supplies more than 80% of the planet's total vessels, and [PAWN_nameDef] is a technician working in the Republic's largest shipyard that produces a variety of vessels including cruise ships, container ships, warships and aircraft carriers. [PAWN_pronoun] had busy days with daily paperwork and process management.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_39.title: Kurin Restaurant Waiter
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a waiter in a luxury restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] took orders or took hats and coats from customers and put them on hangers. But [PAWN_pronoun] actually wanted to work in a kitchen because [PAWN_pronoun] had knowledge for cooking a little bit.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_40.title: Kurin Nurse
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran nurse. Even after a seriously wounded Kurin was brought to the emergency room, [PAWN_pronoun] did not panic and carefully begun hemostasis and first aid.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_41.title: Kurin Astronomer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] analyzed the data sent by the deep space probe to create a detailed space map and calculated the interplanetary flight path of the probe. The calm life of lab made [PAWN_nameDef] weaker than others.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_42.title: Kurin Bioengineer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_42.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bioengineer studying genetic engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] researched the genes of Kurin and found new treatments for diseases. While studying genes, [PAWN_pronoun] discovered that Kurin had a chromosome structure that could not occur without artificial gene manipulation, but [PAWN_pronoun] decided to kept it as secret.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_43.title: Kurin AI Engineer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] knew the dangers of mechanoids and tried to develop new artificial intelligence humanoid robots. The failure continued, but [PAWN_pronoun] sat down and continued to study, remembering those who died because of the mechanoids.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_44.title: Kurin Geologist
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_44.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a geologist who surveys huge faults, volcanoes and lands. [PAWN_pronoun] dig the ground with a drill or pickaxe, or sometimes sniff around, for research purpose.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_45.title: Kurin Highschool Teacher
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_45.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high school math teacher and a mentor. [PAWN_pronoun] had a busy life leading many Kurin students until they get graduated.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_46.title: Kurin Surgeon
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_46.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a surgeon working at a general hospital in a local city. There were not many patients to care for, but recently harassment by humans have been increased, so [PAWN_pronoun] became busy.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_47.title: Kurin Public Healthcare Doctor
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a public healthcare doctor of the Kurin Medical and Health Department. [PAWN_pronoun] could have become a normal doctor with private hospital, but [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to improve the healthcare of Kurins, so [PAWN_pronoun] gave up and chose to become a public healthcare doctor.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_48.title: Kurin Pop Idol
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rising Kurin pop idol. The popularity of [PAWN_pronoun] with great dancing skills, outstanding singing skills and beautiful appearance has increased day by day and [PAWN_pronoun] appeared on many TV shows.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_49.title: Kurin Rising Singer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_49.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known singer-songwriter, and released several albums already. [PAWN_pronoun] has been invited to several stages and occasionally appeared on TV shows.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_50.title: Kurin Drama Actor
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_50.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced actor, and have played numerous roles, regardless of the main characters or extras. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to appear in several films and plays, with a flexible voice and realistic acting skills.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_51.title: Kurin Opera Actor
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_51.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of a opera troupe who sings beautiful songs and plays in decorated beautiful costumes. The troupe was not that famous, but [PAWN_pronoun] loved this local city filled with forests, fields, sounds of nature and most importantly, friendly Kurins.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_52.title: Kurin Enlisted
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a enlisted fox, which are very backbone of the Republic of Kurin Army. All of them are volunteered personnel. If they need more troops, they hire mercenaries. The strong economic power of the Republic made this possible.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_53.title: Kurin Marksman
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_53.desc: Most Kurins can shoot precisely thanks to their good eyes and dexterous hands, but [PAWN_nameDef] have exceptional shooting skills among them. So if [PAWN_pronoun] wield a sniper rifle, [PAWN_pronoun] could quickly take down the enemy.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_54.title: Kurin Ranger
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a ranger in charge of protecting the snow-capped forests and mountains in the north. [PAWN_pronoun] managed the forest with sensitive nose and ears, smelling the scent of forest, and hearing the sound of wildlife. In the event of forest fire, [PAWN_pronoun] went out to put out fire and rescued the stranded.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_55.title: Kurin Spy
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_55.desc: After Kurins crashlanded on a rimworld, they felt the need for spying other factions. [PAWN_nameDef] received military training to scout enemies quickly and covertly, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to figure out other faction's outposts, trends, and so on.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_56.title: Kurin Medic
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a medic to save dying fellow soldiers in battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] honed medical skills to save comrades, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon realised that sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] have to kill enemies to save them.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_57.title: Kurin Sergeant
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_57.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fox with leadership. When Kurins crashlanded on rimworld, [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered for a guard duty with a rifle in hand. After the Kurin faction have been stabilized, [PAWN_pronoun] applied to the Sergeant, as [PAWN_pronoun] had pretty good experience back in the Republic Army.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_58.title: Kurin Redfox
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_58.desc: Shortly before migration of the Republic, the conflict with humans intensified, and [PAWN_nameDef] proved that [PAWN_pronoun] had trained combat skills harder than anyone else on the battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in numerous battles, killing countless humans with precise shooting skills and quick judgment, and comrades called [PAWN_nameDef] a Redfox.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_59.title: Kurin Officer
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_59.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few officer from the glitterworld military. Most of the work was a boring paperwork, but with a lot of spare time, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to read a lot of books and practice VR shooting. Above all, thanks to serving as a adjutant under a well known commander called 'Coyote', [PAWN_pronoun] heard numerous tales from the battles.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_60.title: Kurin Bomber Pilot
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_60.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Kurin soldier, participated conflict between humans. [PAWN_pronoun] used dive bombing technique to precisely bomb fortresses or warships, and destroyed countless targets. [PAWN_nameDef] was a Kurin, but [PAWN_pronoun] was not interested in the Kurin race, and tried to be loyal to the military.

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_61.title: Kurin Warmonger
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_61.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] quickly proved themselves to be ruthless in combat and won many victories

Kurin_BackstoryAdult_62.title: Kurin Nymph
Kurin_BackstoryAdult_62.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with sex and uses their appeal to their advantage.

Dragonian_SlaveChild.title: Abandoned Dragonian
Dragonian_SlaveChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a dragonian raised by human hands.

Dragonian_Slave.title: Abandoned Dragonian
Dragonian_Slave.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a dragonian raised by human hands.

CHDR_ColonyChild.title: Child of the colony
CHDR_ColonyChild.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and grew up on a rimworld-colony.

HouseServant86.title: домашняя прислуга
HouseServant86.desc:
После того, как молодости {PAWN_possessive} похищают и продают богатым аристократам, {PAWN_nameDef} работает в качестве домашней прислуги.
Там, в особняке своего господина, {PAWN_nameDef} изучает все кухни и подвалы, но при этом не имеет возможности выходить наружу.

HeadButler50.title: head butler
HeadButler50.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the head servant in a royal house.
[PAWN_pronoun] managed the other servants to ensure the lord's will was done, even before the lord knew what it was.

RoyalMasseuse43.title: royal masseuse
RoyalMasseuse43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a massage artist for an extended royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] serviced many members of the royal family, and their guests.
[PAWN_nameDef] occasionally offered something extra, if the lord or lady was in the mood. Advancing in this line of work meant having refined social skills.

MenagerieKeeper1.title: menagerie keeper
MenagerieKeeper1.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] managed the royal menagerie of a powerful family at their estate.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s job saw [PAWN_pronoun] feeding elephants, tranquilizing lions, and training birds to display their plumage to titled visitors.

BalletDancer81.title: ballet dancer
BalletDancer81.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dancer in a traditional ballet troupe. [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the ancient motions and entertained thousands.

OrnamentMaker56.title: ornament maker
OrnamentMaker56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted watches, medals, machined jewelry and other complex curios for royal patrons.

RoyalCook18.title: royal cook
RoyalCook18.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] made meals for [PAWN_possessive] aristocratic patrons.
Only the finest food was acceptable, so [PAWN_nameDef] tended a small garden on the mansion grounds to get the freshest herbs and vegetables. [PAWN_pronoun] fell in love with the food [PAWN_objective]self.

ImperialPriest24.title: imperial priest
ImperialPriest24.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a priest in the imperial church.
[PAWN_pronoun] spent half [PAWN_possessive] time studying books to understand the relationship between God's aspects and the facets of [PAWN_possessive] society. The other half was spent preaching the evils of sloth and drink.

ImperialInquisitor53.title: imperial inquisitor
ImperialInquisitor53.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an inquisitor in the imperial church's anti-heresy school.
[PAWN_nameDef] hunted unorthodox thoughts wherever they could be found - art, music, code, even private conversations. Upon finding deviance, [PAWN_pronoun] exposed it to bring on the punishment of the collective. And [PAWN_pronoun] could always find the deviance if [PAWN_pronoun] looked hard enough.

ChurchPsychic98.title: church psychic
ChurchPsychic98.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a psychic in the imperial church's psychic school.
[PAWN_nameDef] trained [PAWN_possessive] mind to sense the collective emotions and impressions of the people. It was a way to touch the spirit of the empire. It was also a way to root out heretical trends in thought.

CorporateDrone10.title: corporate drone
CorporateDrone10.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked in a very large office complex along with thousands of other suited drones.
The work itself consisted of endless organizational drudgery and pointless meetings, punctuated by the occasional performance review.

CorporateManager76.title: corporate manager
CorporateManager76.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive open-plan office, ensuring that [PAWN_possessive] assigned team of workers stayed mostly on-task.
The job was intensely political. In order to advance, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to arrange things so [PAWN_pronoun] could take credit for work done by almost anyone.

CorporateFixer36.title: corporate fixer
CorporateFixer36.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a fixer for an energy corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work required knowing when to push, when to pull, when to back down and when to strike. The job fit [PAWN_possessive] natural lack of empathy.
While violence was unusual, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed prepared for anything.

PlanetaryMiner64.title: planetary miner
PlanetaryMiner64.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mining engineer for a major planetary mining corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work kept [PAWN_objective] underground for weeks at a time, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew to appreciate the darkness.

Mailman2.title: mailman
Mailman2.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] carried mail on [PAWN_possessive] assigned routes. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] was even sent to deliver special packages to stylish corporate offices or mansions.
[PAWN_nameDef] got pretty good at avoiding and fighting off angry dogs.

Assembler69.title: assembler
Assembler69.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on factory assembly lines, putting together products with the help of robots.

Builder96.title: builder
Builder96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on construction sites, building everyday structures according to [PAWN_possessive] boss' instructions.

CropFarmer17.title: crop farmer
CropFarmer17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a crop farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed soil, agricultural equipment, weather patterns, and price trends to optimize the planting and harvesting of massive crop fields.

LivestockFarmer8.title: livestock farmer
LivestockFarmer8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a livestock farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed animal genetics, feed types, birth and slaughter methods, and price trends to optimize the raising of huge animal herds.

ServingBoy97.title: serving boy
ServingBoy97.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the child of house servants, and was trained to carry on the family duty.
[PAWN_pronoun] carried things and polished silverware, but was never allowed into the lords' part of the house.

RoyalBastard3.title: royal bastard
RoyalBastard3.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] the child of a lord and a prostitute.
[PAWN_possessive] father's line was secure and his holdings strong. Nobody ever came to [PAWN_nameDef] to endorse a bid for the title. [PAWN_pronoun] earned [PAWN_possessive] bread cleaning the brothel, but always felt [PAWN_pronoun] deserved much more.

WarBastard60.title: war bastard
WarBastard60.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born nine months after [PAWN_possessive] mother's town was conquered by enemy soldiers. The child of violence with no acknowledged father, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up at the bottom of the social pyramid.
[PAWN_possessive] mother instilled her bitterness towards men and war into [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_possessive] pet rabbit offered more warmth than any human in [PAWN_possessive] life.

LineInfanteer20.title: line infanteer
LineInfanteer20.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary infanteer in an imperial battalion.
Conscripted at a young age to add bodies the army, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the methods of fighting well enough to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] officers. However, [PAWN_pronoun] never quite understood what was going on around [PAWN_objective] enough to really believe in it.

PiousSoldier67.title: pious soldier
PiousSoldier67.desc: When not training or combat, [PAWN_nameDef] was often at the chaplain's side. [PAWN_pronoun] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to serving both [PAWN_possessive] lord and [PAWN_possessive] religion.

InfantryEngineer46.title: infantry engineer
InfantryEngineer46.desc: Despite being in an infantry battalion, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely fired a gun. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was the rapid construction of defenses, traps, defensive installations, and sapping tunnels.

InfantryMedic6.title: infantry medic
InfantryMedic6.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated the combat wounds of [PAWN_possessive] fallen comrades.

MilitaryCook18.title: military cook
MilitaryCook18.desc:
They say an army marches on its stomach. [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to prepared chow to keep [PAWN_possessive] unit marching, no matter the conditions.
The job required [PAWN_objective] to pay attention to both the nutritional and psychological needs of the troops.

LoyalJanissary59.title: loyal janissary
LoyalJanissary59.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a janissary in a great lord's army. Even more than the other troops, [PAWN_pronoun] felt a sense of duty, and [PAWN_pronoun] drew [PAWN_possessive] life's meaning from the effort [PAWN_pronoun] put to fulfilling [PAWN_possessive] duty.

ReconSniper89.title: recon sniper
ReconSniper89.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional military sniper. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to rapidly reach into unexpected firing positions, snipe key targets, and escape before enemies could pinpoint [PAWN_possessive] location.

Shipcracker37.title: shipcracker
Shipcracker37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s role was to launch through the vacuum of space, land on the enemy ship's hull, punch holes to the interior, and conquer it in room-to-room combat. [PAWN_pronoun] became very good at wielding heavy cataphract weapons to cut both steel and flesh.
[PAWN_pronoun] also developed a taste for the drugs [PAWN_pronoun] used to cope with the overwhelming stress.

BrokenSoldier29.title: broken soldier
BrokenSoldier29.desc:
[PAWN_pronoun] was a strong soldier in a long war of succession. In [PAWN_possessive] final battle, [PAWN_possessive] unit was sacrified to cover a retreat. [PAWN_nameDef] watched [PAWN_possessive] comrades die and was the only survivor.
The experience broke [PAWN_objective] inside, leaving [PAWN_objective] without the coping strategies to moderate [PAWN_possessive] emotions.
[PAWN_nameDef] learned to draw in the hospital.

IntelligenceAgent21.title: агент разведки
IntelligenceAgent21.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} совершенствует свои хакерские навыки, благодаря чему {PAWN_possessive} вербует правительство родного мира в качестве агента разведки. {PAWN_nameDef} получает хорошую боевую подготовку, но больше предпочитает использовать приёмы психологической войны.
Правительственные законы оказываются для н{PAWN_possessive} слишком строги, и {PAWN_nameDef} становится изгоем. Нынешняя {PAWN_possessive} деятельность неизвестна.

Deserter65.title: deserter
Deserter65.desc: After countless battles for a cause [PAWN_pronoun] did not believe in, [PAWN_nameDef] threw down [PAWN_possessive] arms and deserted. [PAWN_nameDef] lived in isolation, hunted by those [PAWN_pronoun] had deserted.

Warmonger35.title: warmonger
Warmonger35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] revelled in bloodshed. Soldiers who served with [PAWN_objective] were terrified of [PAWN_possessive] ferocity. They rarely socialized with [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] did not mind the isolation.

InfantryOfficer49.title: infantry officer
InfantryOfficer49.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an officer in an imperial battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] developed the social and combat skills to do [PAWN_possessive] job well and was respected by the men.

DisgracedOfficer19.title: disgraced officer
DisgracedOfficer19.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an officer in an imperial battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] developed the social and combat skills to do [PAWN_possessive] job well and was respected by the men.
When [PAWN_possessive] unit came under direct fire for the first time, [PAWN_nameDef] fled to a bunker and hid. [PAWN_pronoun] was demoted and never escaped the disgrace.

MilitaryCommissar71.title: военный комиссар
MilitaryCommissar71.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} становится контрразведчиком в одном из батальонов Империи. На службе {PAWN_pronoun} проверяет верность людей и ни разу не отступает без прямого приказа. Всё это не повысило {PAWN_objective} популярность, но зато позволило приобрести большое мастерство в обнаружении малейшей нечестности намерений.

Artilleryman28.title: artilleryman
Artilleryman28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] loaded shells and aimed artillery to pound [PAWN_possessive] army's enemies from afar.

Demolitionist39.title: demolitionist
Demolitionist39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured and planted explosives used to breach enemy defenses. Dealing with explosives every day taught [PAWN_objective] to keep a level head and steady hand.

Firebomber51.title: firebomber
Firebomber51.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] piloted a small fighter-bomber design specialized in spreading incendiary gel on flammable targets.
Conditioned to love the sight of a target lighting up, [PAWN_pronoun] grew to love fire in all its forms - war, cooking, and even for cauterizing wounds in the hospital.

MilitaryChaplain10.title: military chaplain
MilitaryChaplain10.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] stayed with the troops in training and in combat, administering to the dying and reinforcing the faith of the living.
Like all imperial chaplains, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed never to fight [PAWN_objective]self. However, [PAWN_pronoun] acted as a medic and treated the wounded.

RoyalGuard51.title: royal guard
RoyalGuard51.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] guarded the personal palace of a powerful lord.
While violence was rare, palace intrigue was constant. [PAWN_nameDef]'s work taught [PAWN_pronoun] to handle both words and guns.

Propagandist86.title: propagandist
Propagandist86.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled artist and military propagandist. [PAWN_pronoun] created works of art depicting [PAWN_possessive] lords and armies fovourably.

ShipBoy89.title: ship boy
ShipBoy89.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born to low-ranked servants on an ancient starship. The ship's machine persona was like a third parent to [PAWN_objective], and the parts crafting crew [PAWN_pronoun] worked for was like a second family.
[PAWN_nameDef] rarely saw plants or animals, and still finds them unnerving to touch.

MilitaryCadet46.title: military cadet
MilitaryCadet46.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was levied from [PAWN_possessive] family at a young age to become a soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] lived in barracks with other military kids, learning about duty, weapons, pain, and victory.
The trainers sometimes let the kids escape the base to enjoy the wider world. They wanted soldiers who can think independently.

PoliticalCaptive7.title: political captive
PoliticalCaptive7.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped by a rival family and held for ransom. To pass the time in captivity, [PAWN_pronoun] read books and practiced martial arts. [PAWN_nameDef] had few opportunities to develop [PAWN_possessive] social skills.

Delinquent13.title: delinquent
Delinquent13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood behind bars. Following an unsuccessful escape attempt, [PAWN_pronoun] was pressed into the military.

RichKid61.title: rich kid
RichKid61.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] came from a wealthy and influential bloodline. [PAWN_possessive] expensive education included lessons on dueling, leadership, and military strategy.

StreetRat81.title: street rat
StreetRat81.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to a gang of street thieves. [PAWN_possessive] days were spent picking pockets, settling disputes over territory, or high on whatever drugs [PAWN_pronoun] could get [PAWN_possessive] hands on.

SoldiersKid55.title: soldier's kid
SoldiersKid55.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on the ancient starship where [PAWN_possessive] parents were stationed. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the basics of firearm operations and maintenance from the soldiers on board. [PAWN_nameDef] became accustomed to a strict routine and frequent discipline.

Machinist56.title: machinist
Machinist56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for machinery. [PAWN_pronoun] supplemented [PAWN_possessive] family's income by repairing and modifying black market weapons.

Warmaster54.title: warmaster
Warmaster54.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was warmaster to a mid-level royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] oversaw military aspects of the family's strategy.
On the rare occasion a battle occurred, [PAWN_nameDef] directed the military commanders.

Regent9.title: regent
Regent9.desc:
When [PAWN_nameDef]'s family's ally was killed, and his young son inherited his throne, [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed as regent to rule in the child's stead.
[PAWN_pronoun] oversaw diverse matters of house and title, from finances to war to greedy relatives intent on usurping the throne. [PAWN_nameDef] himself never abused [PAWN_possessive] position.

Beastmaster67.title: beastmaster
Beastmaster67.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s family had more children than they had proper titles to inherit. Being of low rank in the birth order, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the honorary title of beastmaster.
[PAWN_nameDef] managed the family's extensive menagerie. While [PAWN_pronoun] never worked hands-on with the beasts, [PAWN_pronoun] connected with them. Few others appreciated [PAWN_objective] the way they did.

ArtsPatron54.title: arts patron
ArtsPatron54.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] managed [PAWN_possessive] family's investments in the arts.
[PAWN_pronoun] chose artists to patronize and worked with them to produce the expressions that most glorify [PAWN_possessive] family, the Imperial church, and the Empire itself.

Spymaster41.title: spymaster
Spymaster41.desc: As soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the post of spymaster for [PAWN_possessive] house. [PAWN_possessive] cold, calculating nature made [PAWN_objective] a natural at the arts of blade, poison, and betrayal.

Landworker98.title: landworker
Landworker98.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] held the position of landworker in [PAWN_possessive] royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] managed the family's lands and all the resources on them - both agricultural and mineral.
Though [PAWN_pronoun] would never work the machines [PAWN_objective]self, managing these enterprises required learning the methods of farming and mining in detail.

CountryLordling92.title: country lordling
CountryLordling92.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a noble family's manor in the outer country. [PAWN_possessive] early years were full of lessons in horseback riding, politics, and religion.
[PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] friends found many ways to break the rules and have fun in the fields and forests.

UrbanLordling82.title: urban lordling
UrbanLordling82.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born to a royal house with a grand manor in a great city. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in lessons on politics.
Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] could, [PAWN_pronoun] would escape with [PAWN_possessive] friends to explore the half-built substructure of the metropolis.

ShipboundLordling12.title: shipbound lordling
ShipboundLordling12.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s family held their power base on a grand, ancient starship. Born and raised on the ship, [PAWN_nameDef] learned all about the rigors of shipboard life, and the politics and methods of interstellar battle and orbital invasion.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned to feel most at home with strong walls close on all sides and the gentle hiss of atmosphere regulators.

PamperedLordling37.title: pampered lordling
PamperedLordling37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s parents did not want another heir. Fearing a succession fight, they decided to neutralize [PAWN_objective] early.
They pampered [PAWN_nameDef] from birth, preventing [PAWN_objective] from developing the grit or knowledge necessary to be a threat to their favored son. [PAWN_nameDef] learned little more than how to manipulate the royal staff to get more food.

UnwantedSurvivor67.title: unwanted survivor
UnwantedSurvivor67.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s noble family did not want [PAWN_objective], but could not afford to be seen directly assassinating [PAWN_objective] either. They attempted to get [PAWN_objective] killed by assigning [PAWN_objective] dangerous training without proper protection at too young an age.
Against all odds, [PAWN_nameDef] survived the jousting contests, horsewar matches, riverrun competitions and warzones. In the end, it only made [PAWN_objective] stronger.

NavyScientist52.title: учёный ВКС
NavyScientist52.desc:
Межпланетные войны выигрываются технологиями, так что имперские Военно-космические силы всегда находятся на острие науки. Более того, именно они первыми получают доступ к артефактам архотеков, так как сами находят их в космосе.
Некоторое время {PAWN_nameDef} работает в одной из лабораторий космофлота.

GlitterworldEmpath26.title: эмпат с мира-утопии
GlitterworldEmpath26.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} обладает удивительной способностью строить хорошие отношения с людьми и улаживать конфликты. Поэтому {PAWN_possessive} выбирают для подготовки в качестве эмпата. Обучение усиливает {PAWN_possessive} врождённые способности, но после него {PAWN_nameDef} больше не в состоянии причинить вред другому человеку.

GlitterworldSurgeon15.title: хирург с мира-утопии
GlitterworldSurgeon15.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} становится хирургом в мире, в котором почти нет болезней и человеческих страданий.
{PAWN_possessive} работа состоит в основном в проведении сложных и искусных пластических операций. {PAWN_nameDef} хорошо понимает, как устроено человеческое тело, но {PAWN_objective} ни разу не приходилось удалять раковую опухоль. Или пулю.

Novelist7.title: писатель-романист
Novelist7.desc: Живя в родном {PAWN_objective} утопическом мире, {PAWN_nameDef} сочиняет невероятно успешные романы. {PAWN_pronoun} ведёт беззаботный образ жизни, днём — творя, ночью — отрываясь на вечеринках, и никогда не занимаясь ручным трудом.

CharityWorker36.title: благотворитель
CharityWorker36.desc: Утопические миры — это рай безопасности и комфорта для тех, кому повезло там жить. Однако {PAWN_nameDef} не может игнорировать соседние планеты, где люди живут в нищете и страданиях. {PAWN_pronoun} старается помочь им, собирая пожертвования и поддерживая нуждающихся.

GlitterworldOfficer60.title: офицер с мира-утопии
GlitterworldOfficer60.desc:
Хотя в утопических мирах достаточно спокойно, обычно они готовы к войне. Подразделение, которым в то время командует {PAWN_nameDef}, редко участвует в каких-либо операциях.
{PAWN_nameDef} любит заниматься разнообразным творчеством, однако {PAWN_possessive} подчинённые предпочитают развлекаться мордобоем, и {PAWN_objective} часто приходится их разнимать.

BiosphereManager95.title: менеджер по биосфере
BiosphereManager95.desc: Много лет {PAWN_nameDef} живёт в утопическом мире, где всю чёрную работу выполняют роботы, а люди ведут праздный образ жизни. {PAWN_pronoun} отвечает за флору и фауну в цветущем парке, куда граждане приходят созерцать красоту живой природы.

VRDesigner87.title: VR-дизайнер
VRDesigner87.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} проектирует игры в виртуальной реальности для жителей утопического мира. {PAWN_pronoun} уделяет огромное внимание мелким деталям создаваемых виртуальных миров. Например, для того, чтобы сделать моделируемые ландшафты максимально реалистичными, {PAWN_pronoun} изучает ботанику.

Architect28.title: архитектор
Architect28.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} проектирует и строит здания. В {PAWN_possessive} родном утопическом мире большая часть технических расчётов при строительстве выполняется ИИ. Это позволяет {PAWN_objective} сконцентрироваться на художественной части работы, и, как следствие, {PAWN_nameDef} не марает рук на настоящей грязной стройке.

Sculptor63.title: скульптор
Sculptor63.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} начинает с обработки камней размером в человеческий рост, но вскоре {PAWN_possessive} замыслы становятся масштабнее. С помощью горнодобывающих роботов {PAWN_nameDef} учится вырезать огромные монументы из целых скал. Вскоре в природных парках {PAWN_possessive} родного мира-утопии появляется множество гигантских фигур, вырезанных прямо из гор.

MedievalFarmOaf58.title: крестьянин
MedievalFarmOaf58.desc:
Возделывание земли, управление повозками с быками, толкание тачек. Рытьё котлованов, посадка семян, прогнозирование урожая.
Средневековые крестьяне не образованны в обычном смысле этого слова, но они знают, как вырастить урожай, не имея практически ничего. Однако такая жизнь не оставляет никаких надежд на участие в интеллектуальной деятельности.

MedievalLord57.title: средневековый лорд
MedievalLord57.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} становится {PAWN_gender ? лордом : леди} на доиндустриальной планете. {PAWN_pronoun} посещает званые вечера, управляет подданными и даже изучает несколько фехтовальных приёмов.
{PAWN_possessive} нежные руки ни разу в жизни не держали инструмента, {PAWN_pronoun} считает ручной труд ниже своего достоинства.

MedievalMinstrel95.title: менестрель
MedievalMinstrel95.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} становится странствующим артистом в средневековом мире.
{PAWN_possessive} всегда можно найти за рассказыванием интересных историй или пением песен, но как только дело доходит до тяжёлой работы, {PAWN_nameDef} словно испаряется. Однако {PAWN_pronoun} может постоять за себя на большой дороге.

Taster16.title: слуга-отведыватель
Taster16.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} занимает должность слуги-отведывателя при дворе средневекового монарха. В {PAWN_possessive} обязанности входит пробовать каждое блюдо, подаваемое на королевский стол. {PAWN_nameDef} не выполняет почти никакой работы и ведёт праздный образ жизни, постепенно заплывая жиром.

Blacksmith72.title: кузнец
Blacksmith72.desc: Работая кузнецом в средневековом мире, {PAWN_nameDef} получает заслуженную репутацию мастера своего дела. {PAWN_pronoun} также неплохо применяет выкованные мечи по прямому назначению.

MessageCarrier77.title: гонец
MessageCarrier77.desc: В средневековом мире самый быстрый способ доставить послание — вручить его всаднику и надеяться, что тот переживёт путешествие. {PAWN_nameDef} становится как раз таким человеком.

MedievalDoctor40.title: средневековый врач
MedievalDoctor40.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} работает лекарем в средневековом мире. У н{PAWN_possessive} складывается твёрдая уверенность, что почти любой недуг можно исцелить небольшим кровопусканием.
{PAWN_nameDef} становится мастером анестезии, автором специальной методики, включающей в себя тяжёлый удар по голове пациента.

Herbalist54.title: травник
Herbalist54.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} селится в лесу неподалёку от деревни. Несмотря на то, что большинство жителей побаиваются {PAWN_possessive}, заболевшие приходят к н{PAWN_objective} за целебными мазями и примочками из растений, что {PAWN_nameDef} выращивает у себя в саду. {PAWN_pronoun} всегда с радостью оказывает помощь. За определённую плату.

MedievalSailor97.title: medieval sailor
MedievalSailor97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] explored the oceans on a wooden ship, seeking out plant and animal specimens from exotic places, and occasionally fending off pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] loved the sea so much [PAWN_pronoun] refused to do all but the barest minimum of work on land, except to sell the treasures [PAWN_pronoun] collected.

MedievalSlave49.title: средневековый раб
MedievalSlave49.desc: Родившись в рабстве, {PAWN_nameDef} ничего не знает о своих родителях. В конце концов {PAWN_pronoun} сбегает от своих хозяев и всходит на борт военного грузового корабля, где {PAWN_possessive} забирают на военную службу.

MedievalLordling19.title: сын феодала
MedievalLordling19.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} рождается в дворянской семье в одном из старых королевств средневекового мира. {PAWN_pronoun} вырастает в каменном особняке, где {PAWN_objective} прислуживают люди из более низких сословий.
Такая жизнь не учит никаким практическим навыкам и вдобавок внушает пожизненное отвращение к ручному труду. Однако тонкости социальных манипуляций {PAWN_nameDef} постигает с ранних лет.

ConventChild16.title: монастырский ребёнок
ConventChild16.desc: {PAWN_possessive} отдают в средневековый монастырь как дитя внебрачной любви. Там {PAWN_nameDef} познаёт праведность тяжёлой работы и послушания, однако высокие технологии становятся ересью в {PAWN_possessive} сознании.

Policeman45.title: policeman
Policeman45.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] kept the peace as a line officer in a municipal police force.
[PAWN_pronoun] was trained in de-escalation, physical control, shooting, and other police skills.

Chef52.title: chef
Chef52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a high-class restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] was famous among patrons for [PAWN_possessive] creative culinary specialties, and infamous among kitchen workers for [PAWN_possessive] casual disdain for grunt work.

Housemate8.title: домохозяин
Housemate8.desc: Во взрослом возрасте {PAWN_nameDef} ведёт домашнее хозяйство и заботится о детях, пока {PAWN_possessive} вторая половинка на работе.

Inventor6.title: изобретатель
Inventor6.desc: В своём мире {PAWN_nameDef} становится изобретателем. {PAWN_objective} удаётся достичь в этом некоторых успехов, разработав несколько технологий, пусть и не самой высокой степени важности.

Teacher20.title: учитель
Teacher20.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} получает гуманитарное образование и начинает работать учителем в общеобразовательной школе. {PAWN_pronoun} обладает обширным запасом знаний. Ученики любят и уважают {PAWN_possessive}.

CivilServant2.title: госслужащий
CivilServant2.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} становится мелким администратором в правительстве, погрязшем в бюрократии и уже отживающем свой век. {PAWN_pronoun} без каких-либо затруднений заполняет сложную документацию и тонко играет с офисной политикой.

Bartender62.title: бармен
Bartender62.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} устраивается работать барменом на космическую станцию, пользующуюся дурной славой. Такая работа — коктейль из одной части приготовления напитков, одной части дипломатии и одной части мордобоя.

ConceptualArtist39.title: концепт. художник
ConceptualArtist39.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} получает известность в художественных кругах своего мира за уникальный творческий стиль {PAWN_possessive} концептуальных работ.
Хотя никто толком не понимает, что именно {PAWN_pronoun} пытается донести до зрителя, {PAWN_possessive} работы высоко ценятся коллекционерами.

Evangelist39.title: евангелист
Evangelist39.desc: В юности {PAWN_nameDef} испытывает религиозное пробуждение. {PAWN_pronoun} решает посвятить остаток жизни распространению откровений своего божества, красоты его культуры, а также необычных методов лечения.

AsceticPriest84.title: аскетичный монах
AsceticPriest84.desc:
После принятия обета молчания {PAWN_nameDef} уходит в монастырь на мирной, захолустной планете, чтобы провести жизнь в тихом созерцании.
Для н{PAWN_possessive} становится счастьем растить овощи в саду и делать сыр в монастырских подвалах.

EscapedConvict90.title: беглый каторжник
EscapedConvict90.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} отрицает своё участие в тех преступлениях, что привели к {PAWN_possessive} заключению в каторжной тюрьме. {PAWN_pronoun} сбегает оттуда, прорыв туннель под стенами при помощи переделанного столового прибора.

Nurse61.title: медбрат
Nurse61.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} работает в больнице индустриальной эпохи и занимается такой рутинной работой, как перевязывание ран и измерение температуры.
Несмотря на напряжённую работу, у н{PAWN_possessive} всегда находится время на беседу с пациентом.

HouseServant63.title: house servant
HouseServant63.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a domestic servant to wealthy homeowners.
[PAWN_pronoun] got to know the kitchens and basements of [PAWN_possessive] master's mansion well, but never did any work outside.

Bodyguard58.title: телохранитель
Bodyguard58.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} находит работу в среднем мире, заключающуюся в защите от всяческих неприятностей тех, кто за это платит. {PAWN_pronoun} приобретает опыт в различных видах боя, а также репутацию человека, безжалостно расправляющегося с теми, кто пытается {PAWN_possessive} обмануть.

Mathematician6.title: профессор математики
Mathematician6.desc:
Работая в университете, {PAWN_nameDef} проводит исследования по математике.
Большую часть своего свободного времени {PAWN_pronoun} тратит на сетевые шутеры. {PAWN_objective} часто достаются насмешки от других игроков из-за {PAWN_possessive} неумения попадать в цель.

Paramedic45.title: парамедик
Paramedic45.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} занимается оказанием экстренной медицинской помощи. {PAWN_objective} часто приходится иметь дело с серьёзными ранениями, имея при себе только ограниченный запас медикаментов.
За все эти годы {PAWN_nameDef} излечивает столько пулевых ранений, что теперь не может даже смотреть в сторону огнестрельного оружия.

Gardener99.title: садовник
Gardener99.desc: В индустриальных мирах всё богатство сосредотачивается в руках тех, кто владеет заводами или продаёт товары. {PAWN_nameDef} становится прислугой в особняке одной их таких семей, ухаживая за их роскошными садами.

Torturer37.title: палач
Torturer37.desc: Работая при средневековом монархе-тиране, {PAWN_nameDef} приобретает репутацию эксперта в области «убеждения». У заключённых, попадающих к н{PAWN_objective} в темницу, не остаётся никаких секретов, зато {PAWN_possessive} улыбка преследует их в кошмарах до конца жизни.

Defector78.title: перебежчик
Defector78.desc:
В молодом возрасте {PAWN_nameDef} решает убежать от гнетущего диктаторского режима государства, в котором на тот момент живёт. Это бегство власти расценивают как государственную измену, и по {PAWN_possessive} следу отправляют агентов.
Все годы, что {PAWN_nameDef} проводит в бегах, {PAWN_pronoun} лечит свои раны самостоятельно, чтобы ни один врач не мог {PAWN_possessive} выдать. Все эти испытания озлобляют {PAWN_possessive} и отучают доверять людям.

ConstructionEngineer32.title: бригадир
ConstructionEngineer32.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} начинает работать в одном из средних миров. Бригада рабочих под {PAWN_possessive} руководством участвует в строительстве самых разных объектов: от офисных зданий до соборов.
Из-за нехватки времени и обилия забегаловок с фастфудом {PAWN_nameDef} не занимается готовкой.

Rancher43.title: rancher
Rancher43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a successful ranch where [PAWN_pronoun] raised animals for meat and wool.
[PAWN_pronoun] refused to do any dumb labour [PAWN_pronoun] could pay someone else to do for [PAWN_objective].

LowWageWorker7.title: низкоопл. рабочий
LowWageWorker7.desc: Стремясь прокормить семью, {PAWN_nameDef} перебивается случайными заработками, работая на самых разных работах. {PAWN_pronoun} получает базовые навыки ручного труда.

Model99.title: модель
Model99.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} становится моделью в рекламе одежды и украшений. Кроме того, {PAWN_possessive} используют как образец для моделирования персонажей виртуальной реальности.

Geologist66.title: геолог
Geologist66.desc:
На протяжении нескольких лет {PAWN_nameDef} работает совместно с шахтёрами и спелеологами, определяя типы горных пород и минералов.
За это время {PAWN_pronoun} учится ремонтировать буровое оборудование и прочую технику.

Jailbird40.title: арестант
Jailbird40.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} проводит большую часть своей жизни в тюрьме, где {PAWN_possessive} часто назначают работать на кухне. {PAWN_pronoun} нередко ввязывается в драки и вырабатывает агрессивный стиль общения.

Actor72.title: актёр
Actor72.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} путешествует по своему миру в составе актёрской труппы. Они собирают полные залы и повсеместно любимы публикой. Из-за своего перфекционизма {PAWN_pronoun} всегда самостоятельно готовит для себя реквизит и костюмы вместо того, чтобы пользоваться имеющимися.

Veterinarian99.title: ветеринар
Veterinarian99.desc: Повзрослев, {PAWN_nameDef} начинает зарабатывать на жизнь, исцеляя больных и раненых животных. Вид их страданий повлиял даже на {PAWN_possessive} отношение к мясным блюдам: на многие годы {PAWN_pronoun} становится вегетарианцем, отвергнув «мясоедские» кулинарные традиции своего мира.

ExplosivesExpert26.title: взрывотехник
ExplosivesExpert26.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} начинает работать взрывотехником в шахтах. {PAWN_pronoun} очень серьёзно относится к своей работе и хорошо разбирается в технической стороне дела. Настолько, что отказывается унижаться до помощи в разборе завалов породы после очередного точно рассчитанного взрыва.

Counselor26.title: психолог
Counselor26.desc: В молодом возрасте {PAWN_nameDef} получает ужасную психологическую травму, которая приводит к нарушениям пищеварения. Консультации у психолога помогают {PAWN_objective} восстановить нормальный режим питания, и {PAWN_pronoun} решает использовать полученные знания для того, чтобы помогать другим людям в преодолении их эмоциональных проблем.

Recruiter4.title: вербовщик
Recruiter4.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} — бывший член уважаемого ордена мастеров боевых искусств, печально известных как своими боевыми навыками, так и отказом от лечения собственных раненых.
В {PAWN_possessive} обязанности входило путешествовать по родному миру, отбирая молодых людей для обучения и тренировок в ордене.

Drifter67.title: скиталец
Drifter67.desc:
Не имея особых планов на жизнь, {PAWN_nameDef} часто путешествует, перебиваясь случайными заработками, если удаётся их найти.
Кроме того, {PAWN_pronoun} время от времени работает над романом, который точно должен стать бестселлером — как только {PAWN_nameDef} сможет найти заинтересованного издателя.

MachineCollector55.title: коллекционер машин
MachineCollector55.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} без ума от старых машин и загадочных технологий. {PAWN_pronoun} достаёт такие механизмы любыми способами и любит разбирать их, чтобы узнать, как они работают.
У н{PAWN_possessive} появляется привычка продолжать говорить о своей коллекции, даже когда окружающие уже {PAWN_possessive} не слушают.

ConArtist80.title: мошенник
ConArtist80.desc: Вместо того чтобы делать хоть что-нибудь своими руками, {PAWN_nameDef} легко убеждает других отдавать {PAWN_objective} плоды их труда.

VatgrownSoldier8.title: выращенный солдат
VatgrownSoldier8.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} воспитывается не как личность, а как инструмент уничтожения. {PAWN_possessive} ускоренно выращивают на специальном объекте по производству биооружия, обучая всем аспектам ведения боя. У н{PAWN_possessive} до сих пор сохраняется тяга к сражениям и нежелание общаться с людьми.

SicklyChild55.title: болезненный мальчик
SicklyChild55.desc: Всё детство {PAWN_nameDef} страдает от редкой болезни. На постоянном карантине в исследовательской больнице у н{PAWN_possessive} минимум контактов с людьми и практически никаких физических нагрузок. Однако в этих стерильных лабораториях {PAWN_pronoun} подробно знакомится с наукой и медициной.

FrightenedChild43.title: пугливый мальчик
FrightenedChild43.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} растёт, страдая целым набором фобий и неврозов. Помимо всего прочего, {PAWN_pronoun} боится также докторов и микроорганизмов пищевого происхождения.
Как результат, {PAWN_pronoun} учится готовить и заботиться о себе самостоятельно. Однако многие из {PAWN_possessive} страхов не оставляют {PAWN_possessive} и в более взрослом возрасте.

ComaChild57.title: коматозник
ComaChild57.desc: В результате несчастного случая, произошедшего в детстве, {PAWN_nameDef} впадает в кому. {PAWN_possessive} тело так и не оправляется от долгих лет без движения. Впрочем, услышав эту историю, большинство людей жалеют {PAWN_possessive}.

Pyromaniac18.title: пироман
Pyromaniac18.desc:
С раннего возраста {PAWN_nameDef} питает к огню нездоровый интерес. Когда {PAWN_pronoun} зажигает огонь, пламя настолько завораживает {PAWN_possessive}, что {PAWN_pronoun} может по рассеянности обжечься.
В один прекрасный момент {PAWN_possessive} дом сгорает из-за неосторожной игры со спичками.

Mute34.title: тихоня
Mute34.desc: В детстве {PAWN_nameDef} переживает травмирующее {PAWN_possessive} событие. Из-за этого много лет {PAWN_pronoun} не хочет говорить с людьми и предпочитает играть с кучей своих домашних животных.

WarRefugee51.title: беженец
WarRefugee51.desc:
На планете, где живёт {PAWN_nameDef}, вспыхивает война.
Собрав еду и вещи, какие удалось найти, {PAWN_pronoun} со своим отцом угоняет корабль и покидает родную планету.

MusicalKid86.title: musical kid
MusicalKid86.desc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] had a talent for playing musical instruments and singing. [PAWN_pronoun] was given expert training and loved to perform in recitals and concerts, though the lavish praise [PAWN_pronoun] received made [PAWN_objective] a little self-obsessed.

ChildStar74.title: юная звезда
ChildStar74.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} обретает широкую известность в своём мире, играя роли в разных фильмах и телешоу. Такая слава позволяет {PAWN_objective} установить контакты с самыми разными людьми, а также определяет путь дальнейшего развития.

ChildSpy47.title: ребёнок-шпион
ChildSpy47.desc:
Дети часто выглядят невинными, поэтому их используют как шпионов. Во времена своей ранней молодости {PAWN_nameDef} обучается искусству проникновения и сбора информации.
{PAWN_nameDef} проводит годы за линией фронта, собирая разведданные во время жестокой планетарной войны. В это время {PAWN_pronoun} имеет ограниченные возможности для образования.

ShopKid36.title: shop kid
ShopKid36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother was often ill, and it fell to [PAWN_objective] to run the store which was their only source of income. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a little about the exotic artifacts which [PAWN_pronoun] sold, and a lot about the art of the deal.

OrganFarm67.title: донор органов
OrganFarm67.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} вырастает глубоко под землёй на нелегальной ферме органов. {PAWN_possessive} тело используется для выращивания органических имплантов для раненых наёмников. Хотя такого рода «воспитание» накладывает отпечаток на {PAWN_possessive} психику, оно даёт {PAWN_objective} особое понимание биологии человека.

MedicalAssistant12.title: помощник медика
MedicalAssistant12.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} рождается во время ужасной войны, в которой обе стороны широко применяли напалм. {PAWN_pronoun} вырастает, помогая своим родителям в госпитале, обрабатывая бесконечный поток ужасающих ожогов на телах солдат. Страх перед огнём остаётся у н{PAWN_possessive} на всю жизнь.

CultChild3.title: дитя культа
CultChild3.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} рождается в могущественном культе, отвергнувшем высокие технологии. Культисты верили, что любую хворь следует лечить, очищая душу священными ритуалами.
Однажды {PAWN_objective} удаётся увидеть внешний мир, и это сподвигает {PAWN_possessive} сбежать.

StoryWriter67.title: писатель
StoryWriter67.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} с детства любит читать, проводя целые дни в библиотеке и уткнув свой нос в книгу. Когда бюджет города урезают, и библиотека закрывается, {PAWN_pronoun} сначала расстраивается, но затем решает заполнить появившуюся пустоту написанием своих собственных книг.

FactoryWorker58.title: рабочий фабрики
FactoryWorker58.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} растёт в большом городе-фабрике индустриального мира.
